greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Rectangular table where T(n,k) is the sum of the n-th powers of the k-th row of multinomial coefficients in triangle A036038 for n>=0, k>=0, as read by antidiagonals.
link: Paul D. Hanna, Table of rows 0..32 as read by antidiagonals, with index n = 0..528.
formula: G.f. of row n: Sum_{k>=0} T(n,k)*x^k/k!^n = Product_{j>=1} 1/(1 - x^j/j!^n).
example: The sums of the n-th power of terms in row k of triangle A036038 begin:
Note that row n=0 forms the partition numbers A000041.
maple: b:= proc(n, i, k) option remember; `if`(n=0 or i=1, 1,
b(n-i, min(n-i, i), k)/i!^k+b(n, i-1, k))
seq(seq(A(d-k, k), k=0..d), d=0..10);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 11 2019
mathematica: Table[Table[A[d-k, k], {k, 0, d}], {d, 0, 10}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 06 2019, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Aug 11 2012
